'Flavour wizard:' Japanese chocolatier conquers Belgium.

When Yasushi Sasaki moved from Japan to Belgium at the age of 19, he spoke not a word of French and had no clue what he would do with his life. Last month, at the age of 52, he was named Brussels' chocolatier of the year‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/ryCFdPyu3I
